INCLUDE(../../../LuaPlusBuildTypes.cmake)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(../../../Src/LuaPlus/src)
SET(SRCS
		luac.c
		print.c
)

IF (MSVC)
	ADD_DEFINITIONS(-D_CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE -D_CRT_NONSTDC_NO_DEPRECATE)
ENDIF (MSVC)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(LuaPlusC ${SRCS})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(LuaPlusC LuaPlusStatic)
LUAPLUS_FIX_TARGET(LuaPlusC)
